title: Italian Language Studies - Advanced
headline: Speak Italian fluently and proficiently using complex texts and practical exercises provided in this free online course.
description: Are you interested in learning the Italian language, or do you wish to improve your current proficiency in the language? Enrolling in this course will assist you in becoming closer to achieving your goals while enhancing your knowledge and familiarity with the Italian language. Learn how to apply articles, adjectives, progressive connections and modal verbs in Italian and examine interesting Italian cultural practices. Enrol now.
courseDescription:
Understanding the language of the country you visit is an exciting experience. You can also encounter this incredible feeling the next time you visit Italy or other regions where they speak Italian. This course covers a wide range of materials to give you the most flexible and comprehensive background possible. First, you will study the rules for using definite and indefinite articles correctly and then examine new travel-related and Italian cultural vocabulary, including words for cuisine, music and art. We will explore some intriguing facts about Italy's most spectacular tourist attractions.

Next, you will learn the days of the week, months and seasons of the year and familiarise yourself with the Italian cardinal numerals. After that, we go through the main categories of Italian adjectives and guide you in answering practical exercises that put the knowledge you have learned into practice. To help you become a fluent and proficient Italian speaker, you will also study the present progressive tense, negation and modal verbs in Italian.

Finally, you will learn new interrogative vocabulary, master the Italian question structure, and become conversant with several common locations and superlative adverbs. Take your Italian language knowledge and abilities to an advanced level with this specialised course from Pronto! They have expertise in structuring and delivering knowledge to efficiently reduce the learning curve and help you gain a language. With this course, your next destination is proficiency and fluency. So start today with Pronto! and become an Italiano Vero.
